description.zh: mCaptcha 是一个基于工作量证明的、尊重隐私的免费 CAPTCHA 系统，提供出色的用户体验。它用静默自动化的流程取代了传统的图像验证码，大幅减少用户交互。系统通过计算任务来防止滥用，同时保障合法用户的使用体验。
description.en: mCaptcha is a free, privacy-respecting CAPTCHA system based on proof-of-work that offers an excellent user experience. It replaces traditional image-based CAPTCHAs with a silent, automated process that requires minimal user interaction. The system leverages computational work to prevent abuse while maintaining usability for legitimate users.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 消除用户对烦人图像验证码的交互需求
- 通过无 Cookie 的验证机制保护用户隐私
- 在服务器负载与用户计算之间实现良好平衡
- 强防御重放攻击
- 支持 NAT 后的用户场景

## 功能列表:

- 基于 SHA256 的工作量证明限速机制
- 一键式 CAPTCHA 解决流程
- 基于令牌的验证机制
- 支持通过 Docker 自托管部署
- 生命周期短且仅可使用一次的工作量证明配置
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Eliminates frustrating image-based CAPTCHAs for users
- Respects user privacy with cookie-free authentication
- Balances server and user computational load effectively
- Offers strong resistance against replay attacks
- Works seamlessly behind NATs

## Features:

- SHA256-based proof-of-work system for rate limiting
- One-click CAPTCHA solving process
- Token-based validation mechanism
- Docker-based deployment with self-hosting support
- Short-lived, single-use proof-of-work configurations
